page.title: 03Population
page.content: Rochdale's total population was 206,331 in 1981. This figure, in comparison to the 1971 census of 207,430, shows a decline of over a thousand in the past ten years. Population figures for the town betray the influx of immigrant groups in the past twenty years. Pakistanis are without doubt the dominant ethnic minority and in 1981, amounted to 2% of the total population. In inner Rochdale,there are 9,543households headed by a person from the Commonwealth,which represents 10.1% of the total population.
